fileUpload.dragDrop: Drag & drop or click to browse

matchResume.title: Match Resume with JD
matchResume.subtitle: Analyze how well a candidate's resume matches a job description
matchResume.resumePlaceholder:
Paste resume content here...

Example:
John Doe
Senior Software Engineer
john.doe@email.com

EXPERIENCE:
Google (2019-2024) - Senior Software Engineer
- Led team of 5 engineers
- Built React dashboard for 10M+ users

SKILLS: Python, JavaScript, React, Node.js, AWS

EDUCATION:
MIT - BS Computer Science, 2017
matchResume.jdPlaceholder:
Paste job description here...

Example:
Senior Software Engineer at TechCorp
Location: San Francisco, CA

About the role:
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to lead our backend team.

Required Qualifications:
- 5+ years of software engineering experience
- Expert-level Python programming
- Strong experience with React

Nice to have:
- AWS or cloud infrastructure experience
- Machine Learning background

Responsibilities:
- Lead technical design decisions
- Mentor junior engineers
matchResume.errorMissing: Please provide both resume and job description

inviteCandidate.title: Invite Candidate to Interview
inviteCandidate.subtitle: Send interview invitation via GoHire 一键邀约 API
inviteCandidate.externalHint: View the actual request sent to GoHire 一键邀约 API for testing
inviteCandidate.interviewerPlaceholder: e.g., Ask about work location preference, salary expectation...
inviteCandidate.recruiterHelp: Used for receiving notifications and as BCC recipient
inviteCandidate.interviewerHelp: Additional requirements for the interview (location, rounds, etc.)
inviteCandidate.resumeLabel: Resume (must include candidate's name and email)
inviteCandidate.resumePlaceholder: Paste resume content here... Must include candidate's name and email address.
inviteCandidate.name: Name
inviteCandidate.errorMissingResumeJd: Please provide both resume and job description
inviteCandidate.tip: Tip: Copy and run this code in your terminal/console to test the GoHire API directly

evaluateInterview.title: Evaluate Interview
evaluateInterview.subtitle: Analyze an interview transcript against resume and JD
evaluateInterview.specialInstructionsPlaceholder: Add any special instructions for the evaluation, e.g., 'Focus on system design skills' or 'Pay attention to communication clarity'
evaluateInterview.loadingWithCheating: Evaluating interview and running cheating detection...
evaluateInterview.cheatingIncluded: Cheating detection analysis included in results
evaluateInterview.errorMissingFields: Please provide resume, job description, and interview transcript
